content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_leaves", "quantity": 16, "index": 22}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 30}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 33}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a dark_oak_boat, I need to place 5 dark_oak_planks in the crafting grid in a specific pattern. I will start by moving the dark_oak_planks from slot 30 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I will continue moving the dark_oak_planks from slot 30 to the crafting grid in the correct pattern. Slot 3 is below slot 1, so I will move the next dark_oak_planks to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 3 with quantity 1
